tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hand_geometry_measurements (
    measurement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    hand_length FLOAT NOT NULL,
    hand_width FLOAT NOT NULL,
    finger_length FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE employee_information (
    employee_id INT,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    hired_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sensitive_transactions (
    transaction_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    employee_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE employee_identification (
  employee_id INT,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50),
  employee_department VARCHAR(50),
  employee_role VARCHAR(50),
  hand_geometry_id INT
);
